column4: TV's don't support 800x600, the graphics card is almost always automatically scaling to the native ntsc resolution (648 x 486)
True, but in xorg you set the tvout to 800x600
It at least got across the point that we should have 100% free, and then "easily usable" versions :)
The only bad thing automatix had was the compiling from source bit as it does not inform apt
